comment: Dr. Donovan's online course is incredibly straightforward and structured to work at your own pace. There are 3 discussion assignments (only choose 2 to complete), quizzes, and three exams. All assignments are graded fairly and easy to comprehend. The working at your own pace was a game changer for me. Highly recommended!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: She is a very sweet and caring professor. There is a lot of reading, but tests and quizzes are open note. You have about a month to complete each module as well. She has one discussion post per module and you are only required to do 2 out of the 3. Your lowest quiz is dropped and there is one bonus question on each exam.

Dr. D is a kind and caring professor. She grades fairly and the course is fair.  If you study hard you can easily get a good grade.  There are a lot of reading materials, 3 required textbooks, and also a lot of videos.  I definitely recommend her and her class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I thoroughly enjoyed her lectures and I loved that the course was laid out into 3 Units, all open from the first day. I barely read the textbook and mostly just took notes through her lectures and passed everything no problem. Highly recommend this class with Dr. D.

I absolutely loved Dr. Donovan's class. Her class setup was extremely convenient considering she gives you a month/a month and a half to complete all the assignments in a given module. I was able to work at my own pace while balancing other classes/responsibilities. She's also very sweet! She emailed me a scholarship opportunity. Overall 10/10!!

Dr. Donovan was by far my favorite professor this semester! She was very easy-going. Her lectures are insightful. I liked how she organized the course. She split the course in 3 modules. All assignments for each module are due at the same time, but you have a month for each module. So, if you manage your time, you can finish easily without stress.

This online class is paced by yourself with 3 checkpoints throughout the semester, which I enjoyed. However, the video lectures were not helpful to me and the tests were extremely hard in my opinion. The quizzes are not on lockdown, but the 50 question exams are, and the study guides are broad and not too helpful.

3 Exams (lockdown).
13 Quizzes (no lockdown/lowest one dropped).
3 Discussions (2/3 are required).
The study guide doesn't reflect exams.
No extra credit. 
Lectures are pointless.
Read and study chapters religiously to pass exams. 
Be able to apply knowledge to 50 scenarios (exams).
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Loved taking her for Theories of Personality. There are 3 modules, and they're all open in the beginning so you can finish the class early or go at your own pace. Her class is made up from 3 Unit Tests, 3 discussion posts, and module quizzes. The tests and quizzes are open note. Do your work and you will be fine in this class! Take her!
I loved taking Dr. Donovan (online), she's really funny in her PowerPoint and the work was not too overbearing. No lockdowns or webcams. Take her if you can!

She is a very sweet and understanding professor that I ever had. She includes her sense of humor in her PowerPoint lectures online. 3 modules covered, quizzes are about 5 questions each, only have to do 2/3 discussion posts, and three exams. There is an optional paper if you are not satisfied with the exam score you received.
I loved this professor. Her modules were set up very nicely. The quizzes and discussion boards were easy. The tests werent that hard. No need to read the textbook.

She is one of the best professors I have ever had! She has 4 modules where everything in each module is due at once so you can take time with your work. She is always encouraging and giving great feedback on our discussions. Her quizzes and exams are easy (quizlet mostly). I would take her for everything if I could! Don't buy the textbooks though.

This class is super interesting! Watch/take notes on lectures, take the quizzes in each module, write. discussion post, then take a test. 4 modules, you have a month to complete them (can do in one day). Drops lowest exam grade and replaces with an optional paper. Best psyc class taken yet! 10/10 would recommend! Easy A+!! & She's a great professor

Love her! It is set up where everything in a module is due at one time so everything is super lenient. You don't need the book because everything is on Quizlet. Have 3-4 quizzes, an exam, and a discussion every module. She is a super easy A. You also have a makeup paper you can do if you bomb an exam and she will replace your lowest exam grade.

PSYC 3335 with Dr. D was great! This was a four week summer course. We had 4 exams, 13 quizzes, 4 discussion boards, and an optional paper. Overall great professor! She even decided to drop an exam and a quiz because of everything that has been happening with the black lives matter movement. 10/10 recommend taking her!!

Would definitely take this professor again! She is amazing. I took her for a 4-week summer class and it was sooo easy. I learned a lot in this class. There is a quiz for each chapter, 4 tests, and a few discussion posts. Tests and quizzes are super easy. Discussion posts are interesting. You'll want to take this professor!!! Easy A!

Dr. Donovan is amazing. She makes the most boring class in the world fun and full of laughter. Attendance isn't mandatory and there's only one cheap book required. No tests and only noncumulative 6 quizzes, one of which is dropped. Overall I can not say enough good things about her.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Professor Donovan is great. There are 4 modules that are a few weeks long each. Each module has a few readings, lecture videos, quizzes, a discussion post, and a test. Everything is very easy and straightforward as long as you read and watch the lectures. Also has an optional paper that can replace your lowest test grade. Highly recommend.

I love Dr. D! She is so personable and makes the class very enjoyable. Six quizzes which are straight from the book and notes, she drops the lowest quiz grade, and a few assignments which are fairly easy. Would totally take her again!

Professor D. probably is one of the best professors I have had. She made the potentially mind-numbing Careers class interesting and fun. Her enthusiasm is contagious. And she is available outside of class, even for non-class-related stuff.

She is hilarious. She always answers questions and loves to talk with you. She does great powerpoints, and she puts them on d2l. I took the hybrid course, so there was just 6 quizzes on d2l, fairly easy if you read. She gives study guides. A lot of help for grad school. She doesn't sugar coat grad school and career opportunities.

Dr. Donovan was my favorite professor!! Her Careers class is great and will really help you figure out what direction in PSYC you want to follow. Attendance is not mandatory but you will miss a lecture and other info she says for the tests. The tests are pretty self explanatory just make sure you read the chapters. She is very funny and positive!

Great professor with a fabulous personality.  She makes me laugh every class.  She really tries to make a boring class like Careers in Psychology interesting.  Her online quizzes are super hard.  I made a C on the last quiz and I studied hard and read all the chapters and powerpoints.  The questions are way too picky with 1 min per question.

Dr. Donovan is an entertaining teacher.  She is so upbeat and funny.  Even though the careers in psychology class is boring, she really makes it worth going and listening to her amazing lectures.  Her quizzes are hard.  You only have about 1 minute a question, so you really have to know your material and memorize detailed information.

Dr. D is the BEST! She wants the best for her students and is always willing to help. She gives 6 quizzes and drops the lowest one. There 3 other assignments but are really easy. Class is always interesting; they are never boring. One of the best professors here at KSU! Take her, take her, take her!!!

With Dr. D, this class (Prejudice and Privilege) will change your life. She is the best professor I have ever had the privilege of meeting. She has become a mentor of mine and has helped me through so much. I first had her for Careers and I was hooked. Her teaching style and personality are incredible. She is brilliant and very caring. TAKE HER
Very interesting course; however, do not take in the summer if you are not willing to focus and dedicate the time to studying. Teacher was very responsive and truly cares. Would take her again.

Very nice lady. Provides great lecture recordings. However do not take her during the summer. I took her for the 4 week course and it's too much work. She used same course work as a full semester. 4 disc, 12 quiz (5 quest, 5 min) 4 exam (40 ques, 40 min) horrible. Gpa 3.5 but not after this class.

dr. donovan is a great professor. super smart. really nice. she loves what she does. if you have the chance to take any of her classes, i'd say go for it. there were 2 tests, 3 papers, a lot of (good) reading, guest speakers, class discussions, and a lot of love from and for this class.
i took her during summer for psychology of gender. her tests are online and u have to write 2 paper. NOT HARD AT ALL. i study a little and got A.

Best teacher I have ever taken, no doubt. The class material is somewhat interesting so that is helpful. Her style of teaching is unlike any professor I have ever had. I highly suggest you take her. The work isn't a breeze, you have to put forth some effort, but an A is likely if you do the work. Transformations used daily Lectures book not as much

Dr. Donovan is AWESOME!  I really enjoyed her class and she made it entertaining.  Her quizzes are kind of hard so read the book and do the study guides beforehand.  She is very encouraging and challenging.  I am taking her class again.  Loved her!

Dr D is AMAZING!!! Hands down best professor Ive had at K.saw which is why I have taken her for 2 classes. She is very helpful. Even when the work is hard she is willing to go above and beyond. She wants all her studentsto succeed and it shows. you do have to work for your grade but she will help you the whole way through. TAKE HER FOR EVERYTHING!!

Passionate, well versed in material. A little too personable sometimes. Somewhat tough grader. She does not play favorites, but if you're lazy she treats you differently. Expects students to have read & be able to discuss and ask ques. Go to class! you'll be glad you did because she'll also give your average a nudge up
Great prof! I love the enthusiasm she shows for the material
Very good at lecturing but at the end of the day she is racially biased and has favorites.
Dr. Donovan was a great professor! She was extremely easy going and her class was fun. Get the book, it helps with the tests.

Good teacher. But she is overly detailed on the test. her class is good but she isn't that easy. not good at giving details for paper/outline but grades it pretty detailed. I liker her but feel she tries to make the class harder than it really needs to be because she chooses to overly detail the tests. great subjects are covered!
AMAZING TEACHER!!! I would take her for every class if I would! She is fun, and always keeps your attention.
This is my second class with this professor and she is great. Attendance is mandatory and the tests are overly detailed, but her class is always interesting. Get her class if you have the chance.
She is a great teacher. Attendance is important. Best part is she is extremely smart, and attractive. Loved her class, and look forward to having her again

i love dr. donovan. she's an awesome professor. she did a great job of keeping the attention of the class and is VERY willing to meet with students outside of class and help them out. her class was challenging, but overall a great experience. i definitely plan on taking her again.

great teacher! She really opens your mind on the material and makes you think! I took her for psych of gender and had THE BEST experience! It was a maymester class and I actually enjoyed coming to class and wanted to continue on but it was only 2 weeks! Definitely recommend taking her!

Class is the biggest waste of credit hours. Directions on the assignments would change usually the week the assignment was due-so wait till the last minute to do them. Books are little use. Only will connect with certain students, won't waste time with others.
Dr. Donovon was an awesome teacher for Careers. She made everything clear and available online for students to see. She worked hard for those who worked hard for her. Definitely a must take.

very nice teacher. makes powerpoints and posts them on vista. just need to listen to little side comments she makes. very funny. it's a boring class but she does what she can with it. definitely recommend taking her!
Probably my favorite professor in the Psyc department so far. Super helpful and a must take professor!
One of those professors that just make an impact on your life with one little class. She is a must take.

Awesome teacher and person, she cares about what she is teaching and whether her students understand what they need to. Even though it was a may-mester class she is one of my fav. professors that I have had. Lots of work and reading but like I say it was a may class anyways.
She's an awesome professor with great energy and very down-to-earth. Her tests are fair, and I would definitely take her again!

The best teacher I have had in college so far. I absolutely love her and this class. I'm hoping to make her my mentor. If you study her powerpoints and do assignments you shoul have no problem with this class. I would recommend her to anybody and take her again.

Awesome teacher, very entertaining and helpful but very strict. Immediately write your papers as soon as she assigns them then take it to the Psych Lab to get it reviewed over. Doing those 2 things will help you tremendously in the class. Also very strict on APA, if you screw up she will notice and grade you on it.
If you take this class...be sure to study for the quizes & write your paper way AHEAD of time. If you wait then you'll regret it!

This professor was the BEST. She is easy if you just show up and pay attention. Everything on the test is mentioned in class. She is helpful and explains everything clearly. If anyone has asked you was there a class or professor that has changed you in college, she is it. She will change your mind about a lot of things and people.

WONDERFUL professor! Yes she talks about her family, but always to explain a point an is relevant to the topic. She posts power points but you have to come to class to fil in the information. I would have like more questions on the test though. She really made coming to class fun. Very interesting to listen to and funny. I LOVE this professor!

BOORRRINNNGG!! All she talked about was her family.. sometimes it was funny, but I didn't learn ANYTHING from this class. Tests were 25 q M/c, but she tested on things we BARELY covered. Plus there's a group project..come on! Don't take her!

I loved her. She is very good at explaining things in ways they can be understood. She talk about her personal life a little bit however it is always relevant to the topic and helped me understand what the material was actually talking about. Going to class is necessary but she posts her powerpoints on line which is great.

Seriously..best professor EVER. She made research methods interesting and in no way what I was expecting. She is engaging and really wants her students to succeed. She's not like some who try and trip students up on purpose. I wish she taught more classes! I'd take her for everything. Highly recommended.

She really wants you to do well. She is so funny and helpful. I have a hard time going to professors and she made me feel comfortable. She expects alot from her class and will let you know when she is disappointed, but the way she goes about it just made me want to work harder. She is one of the best.

Dr. D obviously enjoys what she is doing.  She does her best to make even the most dry material interesting, and does alright.  She definitely wants the best for her students and tries to help them as much as possible.  I'll be taking her classes again.
Very good sense of humor. Always good about answering questions. Will use as many examples as need to help you grasp a concept.

Dr. Donovan's an amazing professor. She really cares whether or not her students understand. 3 tests, 2 papers and in-class activities. Manages to make research methods an interesting topic. I would definitely take her again for another class.
